Class BCK.GUI.BCKDrawPanel 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.awt.Component
           |
           +----java.awt.Container
                   |
                   +----com.sun.java.swing.JComponent
                           |
                           +----BCK.GUI.BCKDrawPanel
public class BCKDrawPanel
extends JComponent
This class is a custom component that supports scribbling. It also has a popup menu that allows the scribble color to be set and provides access to printing, cut-and-paste, and file loading and saving facilities. Note that it extends Component rather than Canvas, making it "lightweight."

 public void processMouseMotionEvent(MouseEvent e)
